comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Complete scam.I don't know how you came across the website, but do even think about sending your money there.1. Website is poor built. Of course, scammers don't care because they just want your money2. DCEP stands for Digital Currency Electronic Payment, which is the digital version of the Chinese fiat currency yuan. Any website using similar names in their domain is definitely trying to impersonate or scam3. The same website appears in the database of scam websites - Â https://www.globalantiscam.org/scam-websites/d4. It also appears here, use Google translator- https://www.dcard.tw/f/money/p/238145560
